TextBlock.Text: FOLI: Pilea, Keek, it's time. Is everyone in your groups ready to depart?
PILEA: The children are scared; they've never gone far from the settlement before. But they're as ready as they can be.
KEEK: We're ready to go too. Maybe it would be best to use the singularity exit. Longer, but fewer scares for the little ones.
FOLI: I'd prefer not to waste the resources on a detour, but... you're right. Okay, everyone, listen up!
FOLI: As our brothers, sisters, parents, and grandparents of Escall's clan did, we will venture into the furthest reaches of space, where no Nomai has tread!
FOLI: We must leave the safety of the known in order to quantify the unknown! To observe, to study, that is our calling!
FOLI: What lies beyond the <color=orange>Red Seed</color>... Will be ours to discover. Our legacy.
FOLI: And we leave nobody behind.
FOLI: ...I will never make that mistake again.
